title: How Much Moola Is a Molesworth Worth? SOLD, now I know.
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: How Much Moola Is a Molesworth Worth? SOLD, now I know.
posts.post_content:
[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10481/molesworth-sl[/IMG]

Asking $69 shipped for this PSA 2 copy with a Piedmont back.

Any form of payment net to me works.
I will take it. Inbox you now.
It sold for less than Avogadro's number.

[quote name="Peter_Spaeth" post=1609459]It sold for less than Avogadro's number.[/QUOTE]


I would sell my entire collection for Avogadro's number and offer free shipping as well.

[quote name="Peter_Spaeth" post=1609459]It sold for less than Avogadro's number.[/QUOTE]

Hahaha love it
